sentence: Gabriel Sterling (@GabrielSterling) February 4, 2022 x Rep. Liz Cheney: "I do not recognize those in my party who have abandoned the Constitution to embrace Donald Trump.
title: GOP claims 1/6 "legitimate political discourse" because truth is fiction and patriots are turncoats
